title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Rural and Community 
Development) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department rural community development) order 2021

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No.
heading: 2. Anne-Marie McNally, particulars of whose address have been
text_raw:
2. Anne-Marie McNally, particulars of whose address have been 
deposited at the offices of the Department of Rural and Community 
Development, is appointed as Special Adviser to Joe O’Brien, Minister 
of State at the Department of Rural and Community Development with 
effect from 1 February 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

23 February, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [84] 3
